name: hospital-dashboard-root
description: Hospital Dashboard - Root workspace for running all tests

scripts.test:all: npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:server:coverage && npm run test:client:coverage
scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client && npm run install:e2e
scripts.install:e2e: cd e2e-tests && npm install && npx playwright install
